video.title: InuYasha
video.synopsis: Suddenly finding herself in feudal Japan, schoolgirl Kagome teams up with half-demon Inuyasha to retrieve the scattered shards of a sacred jewel.

episodes.synopsis: Years after being sealed away, half-demon Inuyasha is awakened by a high school girl named Kagome who's time slipped back to the Sengoku period.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Overcame Time... and the Boy Who Was Just Overcome

episodes.synopsis: Granted the power to control Inuyasha, Kagome learns that she may be the reincarnation of Kaede's older sister Kikyo who sealed Inuyasha away.
episodes.title: Seekers of the Sacred Jewel

episodes.synopsis: Kagome and Inuyasha each need the other's abilities to gather the scattered shards of the Shikon Jewel, but the two don't get along.
episodes.title: Down the Rabbit Hole and Back Again

episodes.synopsis: Back in the present, Kagome is relaxing at home when Inuyasha comes looking for her, and she returns with him to the past to find Yura.
episodes.title: Yura of the Demon-Hair

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha's half brother Sesshomaru appears, looking for the tomb of their father who was a dog demon. Kagome learns about Inuyasha's past.
episodes.title: Aristocratic Assassin, Sesshomaru

episodes.synopsis: Despite Kagome's assistance in thwarting him, Sesshomaru figures out the location of Inuyasha's father's tomb, which contains a sword he desires.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga, the Phantom Sword

episodes.synopsis: Kagome is able to pull the sword Tetsusaiga out of the altar, and Sesshomaru tries to kill her, angering Inuyasha and triggering a brothers' duel.
episodes.title: Showdown! Inuyasha vs. Sesshomaru

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and Kagome meet a young samurai named Nobunaga whose lord has been possessed by a toad demon, and they set off to rescue a princess.
episodes.title: The Toad Who Would Be Prince

episodes.synopsis: On their journey, Inuyasha and Kagome meet Shippo, a young fox demon who steals a shard of the Shikon Jewel to avenge his murdered father.
episodes.title: Enter Shippo Plus, the Amazing Thunder Brothers!

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha duels Hiten while Shippo tries to use his magic to rescue Kagome from Manten, but the Thunder Brothers won't be defeated so easily.
episodes.title: Phantom Showdown: The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga

episodes.synopsis: When Kagome returns to the present, the power of the Shikon Jewel incites an ancient noh mask to attack her grandfather.
episodes.title: The Terror of the Ancient Noh Mask

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha spots a demon called a tatarimokke which benevolently guides the spirits of children, while Kagome meets the spirit of a girl named Mayu.
episodes.title: The Soul Piper and the Mischievous Little Soul

episodes.synopsis: After Inuyasha and Kagome rescue a girl named Nazuna, they stay overnight at a shrine together and learn more about Inuyasha's transformation.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the New Moon and the Black-Haired Inuyasha

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and the others encounter the ogre Urasue, who robs the grave of Kikyo, the priestess who sealed Inuyasha away. He's determined to stop her.
episodes.title: Kikyo's Stolen Ashes

episodes.synopsis: In order to bring Kikyo back to life, Urasue kidnaps Kagome. When Kikyo is revived, she immediately tries to kill Inuyasha in a rage.
episodes.title: Return of the Tragic Priestess, Kikyo

episodes.synopsis: Miroku, a womanizing young monk, has been collecting shards of the Shikon Jewel. When he steals Kagome's, Inuyasha follows him to get them back.
episodes.title: Mystical Hand of the Amorous Monk, Miroku

episodes.synopsis: An artist named Kotatsu dreams of controlling an army of ogres, powered by a sacred jewel shard. It's up to Inuyasha and the others to stop him.
episodes.title: The Cursed Ink of the Hell-Painter

episodes.synopsis: Naraku gives Sesshomaru a human arm with a Shikon Jewel shard embedded in it, so that Sesshomaru can try to regain possession of Tetsusaiga.
episodes.title: Naraku and Sesshomaru Join Forces

episodes.synopsis: Kagome is injured during Inuyasha's fight with Sesshomaru, and when Inuyasha learns Naraku's plan, he fears for her life.
episodes.title: Go Home to Your Own Time, Kagome!

episodes.synopsis: Kaede leads Inuyasha and Miroku to a nearby cave that featured in her and Kikyo's past. Meanwhile, Kagome tries to readjust to her normal life.
episodes.title: Despicable Villain: The Mystery of Onigumo!

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha's fight with Royakan continues. Kagome interrupts her date with Hojo to return to the shrine, where she senses the jewel's presence.
episodes.title: Naraku's True Identity Unveiled

episodes.synopsis: Kikyo has apparently been resurrected and is living as a village priestess. A wandering monk realizes that all is not as it seems with her.
episodes.title: A Wicked Smile; Kikyo's Wandering Soul

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha searches for Kikyo, but Kagome finds her first. Kikyo takes her prisoner and won't listen to her attempts to explain what really happened.
episodes.title: Kagome's Voice and Kikyo's Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Demon slayer Sango is invited to Hitomi Castle along with her father and her younger brother, Kohaku, leaving their village undefended.
episodes.title: Enter Sango, the Demon Slayer

episodes.synopsis: Believing him to be her enemy, Sango seeks Inuyasha in a misguided quest for revenge masterminded by Naraku, who wants Inuyasha dead.
episodes.title: Naraku's Insidious Plot

episodes.synopsis: After Inuyasha and his friends stop to bury the dead, Sango reveals the secret story of the Shikon Jewel's origins: the priestess Midoriko's own soul.
episodes.title: Secret of the Jewel of Four Souls Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and his friends discover a village that sacrifices children to the local water god and meet a boy named Taromaru who needs their help.
episodes.title: The Lake of the Evil Water God

episodes.synopsis: After Miroku's wind tunnel is damaged in a fight with a demon, Miroku returns to the temple where he was raised by Mushin, but all is not well there.
episodes.title: Miroku Falls into a Dangerous Trap

episodes.synopsis: Kagome and Sango talk about their respective pasts, including Sango's dead younger brother, Kohaku. But Naraku has sinister plans for him.
episodes.title: Sango's Suffering and Kohaku's Life

episodes.synopsis: Sango steals the Tetsusaiga while Inuyasha is fighting Kohaku and heads to Naraku's castle. She intends to kill him, but it won't be that easy.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga Is Stolen! Showdown at Naraku's Castle!

episodes.synopsis: Sango and Kirara need an antidote for Naraku's poison, so Inuyasha and Kagome head to a village where they meet the gentle horse demon Jinenji.
episodes.title: Jinenji, Kind Yet Sad

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and his friends come across a cave when they investigate demons in the mountains. Meanwhile, Naraku learns that Kikyo is still alive.
episodes.title: Kikyo and Inuyasha, Into the Miasma

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and his friends set off to save Kikyo, but they are vulnerable to demonic attacks. Only Kagome is immune, thanks to the Shikon Jewel.
episodes.title: Kikyo, Captured by Naraku

episodes.synopsis: Sesshomaru is dissatisfied with the Tenseiga sword, and he demands that the blacksmith Totosai forge him another. Totosai calls in Inuyasha.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga and Tenseiga

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and Sesshomaru continue their battle, making full use of their respective inheritances. After the fight, Sesshomaru meets the orphan Rin.
episodes.title: The True Owner of the Great Sword!

episodes.synopsis: Koga, the leader of the eastern wolf demon tribe, challenges Inuyasha to a fight after accessorizing himself with shards of the Shikon Jewel.
episodes.title: Kagome Kidnapped by Koga, the Wolf Demon!

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and the others are on their way to rescue Kagome and Shippo. Kagome agrees to help Koga on the condition that Shippo not be hurt.
episodes.title: The Man Who Fell in Love with Kagome!

episodes.synopsis: Kagome returns to the present after another argument with Inuyasha. Back at school, she's confronted with more relationship problems.
episodes.title: Two Hearts, One Mind

episodes.synopsis: Naraku's insects steal a Shikon Jewel shard from the forehead of a bear demon. Wind sorceress Kagura uses a shard to entrap the wolf tribe and Koga.
episodes.title: Trapped in a Duel to the Death!

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha's battle against Koga continues until Kagura herself appears. The Wind Scar is useless against her greater power over the air.
episodes.title: The Deadly Trap of Kagura the Wind Sorceress!

episodes.synopsis: Miroku is reunited with Koharu, a girl who ran away from her village after they met. Then Kagura's older sister Kanna uses Koharu to target Inuyasha.
episodes.title: Kagura's Dance and Kanna's Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha continues fighting Kagura. Kanna's mirror reveals unexpected capabilities when Inuyasha uses the Wind Scar against her.
episodes.title: The Wind Scar Fails

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha demands to know why Kikyo gave the Shikon Jewel shards she stole from Kagome to Naraku, who unleashes a horned ogre demon.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Sesshomaru takes the fangs of the deceased Goshinki to Totosai's renegade apprentice Kaijinbo to make a new sword, while Totosai repairs Tetsusaiga.
episodes.title: Kaijinbo's Evil Sword

episodes.synopsis: Kaijinbo's battle with Inuyasha, wielding the sword Tokijin, ends in destruction, and Kagura senses an opening for Sesshomaru to destroy his brother.
episodes.title: Sesshomaru Wields Tokijin

episodes.synopsis: Koga wants revenge on Naraku for the deaths of his tribe members. When Naraku's newest minion Juromaru challenges him, he gets his chance.
episodes.title: Juromaru and Kageromaru

episodes.synopsis: Kagome returns to the present after a fight with Inuyasha. Meanwhile, Naraku plots to get rid of Onigumo's feelings for Kikyo within him.
episodes.title: Onigumo's Heart Still Beats Within Naraku

episodes.synopsis: In the present, Kagome senses that Inuyasha has chosen Kikyo, and decides never to return to the past after returning the Shikon Jewel shards.
episodes.title: Return to the Place Where We First Met

episodes.synopsis: Sango finds the bodies of her father and the other slayers at the ruins of Naraku's castle. Her brother Kohaku still lives, but he's lost his memory.
episodes.title: Kohaku's Lost Memory

episodes.synopsis: Sango's brother Kohaku has been possessed by Naraku and is trying to kill Kagome. Meanwhile, Inuyasha and Miroku continue battling Kagura.
episodes.title: That Unforgettable Face!

episodes.synopsis: Sesshomaru visits the tree demon Bokusenno seeking the secrets of Inuyasha's transformation. Meanwhile, Sango cares for an unconscious Kohaku.
episodes.title: Inuyasha's Soul, Devoured

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha's life is threatened, and he fully transforms into a demon state. Berserk, he quickly breaks through the cocoon and destroys Gatenmaru.
episodes.title: The Demon's True Nature

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha visits Totosai alone. Totosai tells him that he must slay the great dragon demon Ryukotsusei to become strong enough to lift his sword.
episodes.title: Father's Old Enemy: Ryukotsusei

episodes.synopsis: Separated from the Tetsusaiga by Ryukotsusei, Inuyasha transforms into a demon once again. Totosai tells everyone to flee, but Kagome stays.
episodes.title: The Backlash Wave: Tetsusaiga's Ultimate Technique
